discussion.content: I guess is B and C

questions.question_text: Select two true statements about WebLogic Server's role in transaction management. (Choose two.)

choices.E: WebLogic Server supports transactional Enterprise Java Beans
choices.B: WebLogic Server can act as the transaction manager for multiple transactional resource managers during a distributed transaction
choices.A: You can configure WebLogic Server JTA properties at the domain, cluster, and server level
choices.C: WebLogic Server supports transactional work managers
choices.D: Starting with WebLogic Server 12c, you can create two kinds of clusters: the "standard" cluster, as in previous versions, and the new transactional cluster

questions.question_text: Which two statements are characteristics of the Reconfiguration Wizard? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Correct answer is C, E.

"Select this option to use a JDK other than the one that you used when you installed WebLogic Server. Use the Browse button to navigate to the directory where the JDK resides."

Source: https://docs.oracle.com/middleware/1212/wls/WLUPG/screens.htm#CIHEAIIA

choices.E: You can upgrade only a domain which is running WLS 10.3.x or later
choices.C: The Reconfiguration Wizard allows you to select a different Java JDK
choices.D: The Reconfiguration Wizard does not allow the reconfiguration of JDBC data sources
choices.B: The Reconfiguration Wizard allows you to change the domain mode
choices.A: You can upgrade any domain that was created using WLS 9.2 and above

choices.D: The server attempts to bind to all network interfaces on the host OS
choices.C: The server prompts for an address when it is started the first time

questions.question_text: While using the Configuration Wizard to create a new domain, you do not set the Listen Address for the administration server and accept the default value. What is the result?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Reference document disagrees with the specified answer. The comments are correct.

D is the correct answer.
if the Listen Address value is "All Local Address" This means the server binds to all available IP addresses on the machine.

D
The default value is: "all local addresses"
